jobs_results.title: Senior Application Developer for iOS Platforms
jobs_results.description:
Role Overview

Photon is seeking a skilled Sr. Application Developer for iOS Platforms to join our team. As a key contributor, you will collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features, leveraging your expertise in Swift and Objective-C. Additionally, you will work with APIs and third-party libraries to integrate services and enhance app functionality.

Responsibilities
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
• Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.
• Work with APIs and third-party libraries to integrate services and enhance app functionality.
• Participate in code reviews and maintain high coding standards.

Requirements
• Bachelor's degree in computer science or related field, or equivalent experience.
• Proficiency in Swift and Objective-C.
• Understanding of Apple's design principles and interface guidelines.
• Experience with performance tuning and debugging.
• Knowledge of version control systems (e.g., Git).
• Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work in a team environment.
• Excellent communication skills and attention to detail.

Preferred Qualifications
• Experience with SwiftUI and Combine.
• Familiarity with Agile development methodologies.
• Knowledge of testing frameworks and unit testing.

Confidentiality

All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

jobs_results.title: Senior Android and IOS Developer - Hybrid Position with Benefits
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for a highly skilled Mobile Developer to join our team at Azka It Consulting. As a key member of our development team, you will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and maintaining high-quality mobile applications for both Android and IOS platforms.

Our ideal candidate has extensive experience as a Mobile Developer, preferably with knowledge of Swift and Kotlin programming languages. With a strong focus on innovation and excellence, we are committed to delivering cutting-edge solutions that exceed our clients' expectations.

Key Responsibilities:
• Design and develop high-performance mobile applications for Android and IOS platforms.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify project requirements and develop innovative solutions.
• Maintain and improve existing mobile applications, ensuring seamless user experiences and optimal performance.
• Stay up-to-date with industry trends, best practices, and emerging technologies to continuously improve skills and expertise.

What We Offer:
• A competitive salary ranging from $120,000 to $180,000 per year, based on experience and qualifications.
• A hybrid work arrangement, allowing for flexibility between working from the office and home, while fostering collaboration and communication within the team.
• The opportunity to work on diverse projects, collaborating with talented professionals who share a passion for innovation and excellence.
• An attractive benefits package, including excellent health insurance, paid time off, and professional development opportunities.
• Recognition and rewards for outstanding performance and contributions to the company's success.

jobs_results.title: Senior Software Engineer, Ios
jobs_results.description:
Senior Software Engineer, iOS

We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Software Engineer to join our team at WeWork Reforma Latino in Mexico City. As a key member of our mobile development team, you will be responsible for building and pioneering innovative iOS solutions that deliver exceptional customer experiences.

About the Role:
• Develop high-quality iOS client code solutions that meet product strategy and engineering best practices.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver engaging, purposeful, and powerful customer experiences.
• Actively participate in agile ceremonies and ensure timely delivery of high-quality products.
• Mentor junior to mid-level engineers and contribute to group discussions.
• Engage with developers outside of the local sprint team and lead delivery of major components.

Requirements:
• Intermediate-Advanced English fluency.
• Bachelor's Degree.
• At least 4 years of software engineering experience.
• At least 3 years of experience with Swift.
• At least 2 years of people management experience.

Preferred Qualifications:
• Master's Degree.
• 5+ years of people management experience.
• 4+ years of experience with Swift.
• 4+ years of experience in open source frameworks.
• 2+ years of experience with Agile practices.

The estimated salary for this role is $120,000 - $180,000 per year, depending on experience.

jobs_results.title: Software Architect for Mobile App Development
jobs_results.description:
About Etsy

Etsy is the global marketplace for unique and creative goods. We build, power, and evolve the tools and technologies that connect entrepreneurs with buyers around the world.

We are a 'house of brands' portfolio that has expanded to include four individually distinct ecommerce brands - Etsy, fashion resale marketplace Depop, musical instrument marketplace Reverb, and Brazil-based handmade goods marketplace Elo7.
Job Description

We are looking for a senior backend engineer to join our established Mobile Apps Engineering organization. As a key member of our team, you will collaborate with engineers, designers, product managers, and analytics colleagues to support our native mobile apps.

You will work on building features across the entire Etsy app by collaborating with multi-functional teams and business partners across Etsy. Our growing team requires someone who thrives in a lively environment and loves to have fun while doing so.
About the Role

This is a full-time role that can be based in Mexico City, Mexico. We also consider remote engineers based in Mexico for this position.
About the Position
• *Key Responsibilities:**
• Lead the API engineering work when it comes to unexplored areas of the Etsy mobile app.
• Develop with an eye on quality and scalability by using performance monitoring tooling, automated and manual testing, and observability tools to verify the correctness and quality of your code.
• Work with Product, Design, and native mobile (iOS/Android) engineers in order to determine what is possible on the platform to surprise, delight, and engage our users.
• Effectively conduct technical discovery, break down projects into concrete pieces, and advise on timelines, dependencies, and tradeoffs.
• Guide more junior engineers in their technical and architectural decisions, using thoughtful code reviews, mentoring, and project planning discussions.
About You

We're looking for someone with the following qualifications:
• Experience with backend technologies, such as PHP, MySQL, and Memcache.
• Understanding of creating an API to be consumed by multiple platforms.
• Ability to work closely with product managers, designers, and nontechnical partners to provide them with estimates and scoping large bodies of work.
• A 'leave it better than you found it' mentality, and willingness to work with and improve on code you did not originally write.
• Thrive when faced with customer- and product-focused challenges and care as much about building great products as you do writing great code.
• Love to experiment and use data to drive decision-making.
• Enjoy being a mentor and mentee.
• Take pride in owning work from conceptualization through completion.
• Are a mindful, transparent, and thoughtful communicator.
• Appreciate working with folks who value knowledge sharing and want to contribute to a culture of generosity.
What's Next

If you're interested in joining our team at Etsy, please send a cover letter and resume telling us why you'd be right for the position. We value individuality and variety, and we don't want you to be like everyone else - we want you to be like you.

We offer a competitive salary of $120,000 - $180,000 per year, depending on experience.

jobs_results.title: Swift Developer
jobs_results.description:
Mexico, Mexico

Orion Innovation is a premier global business and technology services firm. We deliver game-changing business transformation and product development rooted in digital strategy, experience design, and engineering, with a unique combination of agility, scale, and maturity. We work with clients across financial services, professional services, telecommunications and media, consumer products, automotive, industrial automation, professional sports and entertainment, life sciences, and education.

We want to create the ultimate listening experience for our customers and know that it starts by listening to each other. As a team member, you'll collaborate with people of all styles, skill sets, and backgrounds to realize our vision while fostering a community where everyone feels included and empowered to do their best work.

As a Senior Mobile Applications Software Engineer, you will be responsible for the software our customers interact with daily. You will create experiences allowing users to configure their systems and control the content they listen to. You will work on our iOS app with multidisciplinary, agile teams.

Responsibilities
- Create technical designs for and implement features in the iOS app.
- Design and Implement framework components and integrate with various SDKs and mobile platforms.
- Collaborate with software engineers, PM, QA, and UX to design and deliver unique new features that delight our customers.

Requirements
- You have significant experience programming in Swift and contributing to an app available in the Apple App Store.
- You have experience using SwiftUI to declare and implement user interfaces and investigating issues and solving problems.
- You are skilled at using common source code control systems (e.g. git) and have a degree in Computer Science or a related discipline.
- Your written and verbal communication skills are strong and you can communicate proficiently in English.

Preferred Qualifications
- Experience with Swift Package Manager to integrate third-party libraries or SDKs and knowledge of asynchronous development, networking, or Bluetooth.

We value diversity and inclusion and are an equal opportunity employer. We want to talk to you if you love music, solving ambitious software problems, and doing things the right way every time.

jobs_results.title: Junior Mobile Developer
jobs_results.description:
JUNIOR MOBILE DEVELOPER

REQUISITOS

2 años de experiencia en desarrollo móvil.
- Nivel intermedio de inglés (B1).
- Experiencia con React y React Native.
- Conocimientos en .Net, SQL y API Rest.
- Desarrollo de aplicaciones para Android utilizando Java o Kotlin.
- Manejo de versiones con GIT.

BENEFICIOS

Seguro de vida profesional.
- Vales de despensa mensuales.
- Bono de puntualidad mensual.
- Reparto de utilidades del 50%。

Tipo de puesto: Tiempo completo.

Salario: $45,000.00 - $55,000.00 al mes.

Horario laboral:

Turno diurno de 8 horas.

Prestaciones adicionales:

Seguro de vida profesional.
- Vales de despensa mensuales.

Tipos de compensaciones adicionales:

Bono de puntualidad mensual.

jobs_results.title: Senior Ios Engineer
jobs_results.description:
Senior iOS Engineer Role

We are seeking a highly skilled Senior iOS Engineer to join our team at Brillio.

About the Job:
• Design, develop, and maintain high-quality iOS applications using Swift and Objective-C.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and prioritize features, as well as provide technical expertise and guidance.
• Stay up-to-date with the latest iOS technologies and frameworks, such as Combine and SwiftUI.
• Experience with Redux or other unidirectional state management paradigms is a plus.

Requirements:
• A minimum of 5 years of experience in iOS development, preferably in a senior role.
• Excellent understanding of Swift, Objective-C, and CocoaPods.
• Familiarity with Jenkins and other continuous integration tools.
• Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work independently.

What We Offer:
• A competitive salary range of $140,000 - $170,000 per year.
• A comprehensive benefits package, including medical, dental, and vision coverage.
• A generous PTO policy and paid holidays.
• Opportunities for professional growth and development within the company.

How to Apply:

Please submit your resume and cover letter to apply for this exciting opportunity.

jobs_results.title: Technical Android Specialist for Mobile App Development
jobs_results.description:
About the Role

We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Software Engineer to join our AppX team at Etsy. This role will focus on building and improving the Reverb mobile app experience for our users.

jobs_results.title: Senior Ios Engineer
jobs_results.description:
About us
Working at Tech Holding isn't just a job, it's an opportunity to be a part of something bigger. We are a full-service consulting firm that was founded on the premise of delivering predictable outcomes and high-quality solutions to our clients. Our founders and team members have industry experience and have held senior positions in a variety of companies and we have developed a unique approach that is supported by the principles of deep expertise, integrity, transparency, and dependability.

The Role
Responsibilities

Be a critical thinker who can anticipate potential pitfalls and suggest improvements.
- Take ownership of your code, and ensure that the acceptance criteria is verified before sending the ticket to QA
- Build new features from the ground up or help enhance or maintain existing projects.
- Collaborate with onsite and offshore engineering teams to produce clean reusable code, and provide constructive criticism through code reviews.
- Work closely with the product managers and turn product requirements into actionable technical stories with well-defined technical specifications and details.
- Work with backend engineers to discuss API and data requirements needed to power iOS apps.
- Help assist QA teams by validating bugs and providing fixes in a timely manner.
- Provide diagrams and architecture documentation that other mobile developers can easily understand

Required Skills

3+ years of iOS development experience, including a strong familiarity with Apple frameworks and object-oriented design best practices
- Knowledge of building and testing large-scale iOS apps and codebases
- Ability to create multi-environment deployment pipelines for new and existing apps
- Time management and organizational skills
- Comfortable working in an agile and fast-paced environment.
- Have a good understanding of using git and the gitflow workflow for source control management and versioning.

Nice to have Skills

Familiarity with React Native, Flutter, SwiftUI, or Fastlane

Education & Certifications

Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or relevant years of work experience

What we offer

Remote Work Opportunities
- Flexible Work Hours
- Professional Development Opportunities

jobs_results.title: Capital One iOS Expert
jobs_results.description:
Career Overview:

As a Capital One iOS Expert, you will be responsible for designing and developing innovative iOS solutions that drive business growth. Your expertise in mobile app development will help us stay ahead of the competition and provide exceptional customer experiences.

About the Company:
• Capital One is a leading financial institution that provides a range of financial products and services.
• We are committed to innovation and excellence, and we strive to make a positive impact in our communities.

Key Responsibilities:
• Design and develop iOS solutions that meet business requirements.
• Lead a team of engineers in implementing cutting-edge iOS solutions.
• Maintain and improve existing codebase to ensure high-quality and efficiency.
